item.title: Fahrenheit 9/11
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Got to see it over the weekend, I enjoyed it whole heartedly. I seriously think everyone should see it, I agree that it's probably not going to cause a whole lot of people to jump to one side or the other, but the movie should cause some great discussions that this country sorely needs. Fahrenheit 9/11 Facts & Notes from Michael Moore
